title: High Latency starting around 10 pm
body: For the past week or so during the evening hours starting around 9-10 pm, my ping skyrockets from a solid 40 ms to around 600 ms. This problem persists all night until the morning, which is then at the regular 40 ms. Hopefully this is an easy fix, any help would be greatly appreciated! thanks!

replies.body: I have the exact same problem as you, my ping skyrockets from 40 ms to 200 (can't move) and does it at exactly 10 pm each night. I live in missouri and a vayne I had in the same game with me also lived in missouri who had lag problems as well.

My ping went from 150 to 188, and it spiked to 500. But I used to play on wifi with 180-190 ping, without problem, but now it seems that delay is way too big! It's like having 500 ping delay but it says 180, it's really weird. Also, unplayable. What bothers me the most is that I am getting the easiest possible match ups, and most stupid enemy laners right then when I simply can't do much with 0.5-1sec delay.
While my issue wasn't as severe, for a few nights last week my ping went to 60 from 40 from 10pm to around 4:30am. While 60ping is more than playable I just found it weird.

If you're still having this issue, then your network might be suffering from packet loss or something else.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results should also yield some troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  Hopefully that gets you fixed up!
